name: "CodeQL"

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "main" ]
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 3 * * 0'   # run once a week (Sunday 03:00 UTC)

jobs:
  analyze:
    name: Analyze (CodeQL)
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      actions: read
      contents: read
      security-events: write

    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix:
        language: [ 'java' ]

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v5

      - name: Set up Java
        # Using Temurin JDK 17 since it's a stable LTS release
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          java-version: '17'
          distribution: 'temurin'

      - name: Initialize CodeQL
        # Sets up CodeQL for Java analysis
        uses: github/codeql-action/init@v4
        with:
          languages: ${{ matrix.language }}

      - name: Build project
        # Build the Maven project so CodeQL can scan the compiled classes
        run: mvn -B -DskipTests package --file pom.xml

      - name: Run CodeQL analysis
        uses: github/codeql-action/analyze@v4
